Package com.deezer.sdk.player.networkcheck

This package contains Java classes used to handle Network policy.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NetworkStateChecker
    Defines the behavior of a component able to monitor network state.
    NetworkStateListener
    Listenes for network state changes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NetworkStateCheckerFactory
    Factory to create NetworkStateChecker
    WifiAndMobileNetworkStateChecker Deprecated
    Use NetworkStateCheckerFactory.wifiAndMobile() instead
    WifiOnlyNetworkStateChecker Deprecated
    Use NetworkStateCheckerFactory.wifiOnly() instead

Package com.deezer.sdk.player.networkcheck Description

This package contains Java classes used to handle Network policy.

All Deezer SDK players needs an Internet connection to get music data from Deezer. Each player uses a NetworkStateChecker to know if such a connection is available.

The WifiOnlyNetworkStateChecker only allows data transfer over Wifi, the WifiAndMobileNetworkStateChecker also enables data transfer over mobile network.

It is a good practice to leave an option in your app's preferences to let the user choose which policy to apply.
